import React,{Component} from 'react' import "./Today.css" import SideBody from './sideBody/SideBody' import News from './news/News.js' import axios from 'axios'; class Today extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { loadingText:"updating...", searchByLL:"", id:"", city:"Lima" } this.findCoordinates=this.findCoordinates.bind(this) this.algito=this.algito.bind(this) this.convertionOfURL=this.convertionOfURL.bind(this) this.updatingState=this.updatingState.bind(this) } algito(state) { if(this.state.todayInfo){ switch (state) { // Sunny case 1000: return "https://image.flaticon.com/icons/svg/1146/1146903.svg" break; // Cloudy case 1003:return "https://image.flaticon.com/icons/svg/1146/1146797.svg"; case 1006: case 1009: case 1030: case 1222: return "https://image.flaticon.com/icons/svg/1146/1146797.svg"; break; } }else{ console.log("no from algo") } } convertionOfURL(a,b){ a = this.state.todayInfo.current.condition.icon; b = a.substring(2, 60) return b } findCoordinates () { if(this.state.loadingText="updating..."){ console.log("yes from cord")} else { console.log("no from cords") } } componentDidMount() { navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition((pos) => { this.setState({ currentPosition: pos.coords.latitude.toString() + "," + pos.coords.longitude.toString(), uri:'http://api.apixu.com/v1/forecast.json?key=82fe923258fa4530a5e235322192604&q=' }); fetch("https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/" + this.state.uri + this.state.currentPosition ).then((res) => res.json()) .then((todayInfo) => this.setState({ todayInfo, currentIcon:1003 })) .catch((err) => console.log(err.message)) }) } componentDidUpdate() { } updatingState(){ fetch("https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/" + this.state.uri + this.state.city ).then((res) => res.json()) .then((todayInfo) => this.setState({ todayInfo })).catch((err) => console.log(err.message)); console.log("updatingState") } render () { {console.log(this.state)} {console.log(this.state.todayInfo)} return(

{this.state.todayInfo ? this.algito(this.state.currentIcon) : "noooo"} {this.state.todayInfo ? this.state.todayInfo.location.name : this.state.loading}, {this.state.todayInfo ? this.state.todayInfo.location.region : this.state.loading}

Last updated {this.state.todayInfo ? this.state.todayInfo.current.last_updated : this.state.loading}

{this.state.todayInfo ? this.state.todayInfo.current.temp_f : this.state.loading}°

  • UV light {this.state.todayInfo ? this.state.todayInfo.current.uv: this.state.loading} out of 10

  • humidity {this.state.todayInfo ? this.state.todayInfo.current.humidity: this.state.loading}%
